thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 01 Mar 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Brazil's B3 misses profit estimates on higher expenses

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Brazil's B3 misses profit estimates on higher expenses
text:
SAO PAULO, March 1 (Reuters) - Brazil’s financial exchange operator B3 SA Brasil Bolsa Balcão missed fourth-quarter profit estimates on Thursday although revenues from equities and derivatives increased.
São Paulo-based B3’s recurring net income totaled 635.8 million reais ($195.56 million) in the quarter, 12 percent below the consensus estimate of 721.8 million reais compiled by Thomson Reuters. ($1 = 3.2511 Brazilian reais) (Reporting by Carolina Mandl)
